channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Mia and Lucy face their biggest game of the season, and buds Masai and Ernest get competitive. Spurs legend Sandro takes on Jayden in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: My Life
channel.desc: The story of a 12-year-old boy waiting for a heart donor.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Gladiators? stars Apollo and Electro surprise children in a Salford school when they lead a PE lesson with a difference.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Chloe's financial problems finally boil over and she is forced to leave A-Troupe. Michelle and Emily decide to be co-captains and work together to not only choreograph a new routine but also get Chloe back in the group.
